DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , non-randomized study evaluate performance MyoScience Cryo-Touch III device treatment glabellar and/or forehead wrinkle .
DOC.brief_title: Cryo-Touch III Refinement Study Investigational Plan
DOC.criteria: Age 3070 year Subject glabellar and/or forehead wrinkle rating investigator least 2 animation 5point Wrinkle Scale ( 5WS ) * Subject sign institutional review board ( IRB ) approve informed consent form Subject take medication dietary supplement regularly affect blood clotting ( e.g. , Coumadin , aspirin , clopidogrel ) increase risk bleeding/bruising Subject prior surgery alters subcutaneous anatomy target treatment sit The investigator unable substantially lessen facial line physical separation Subject undergone another facial cosmetic procedure level cheekbone within past 6 month Subject participate another facial cosmetic research study Patient follow condition : History facial nerve palsy Marked facial asymmetry Ptosis Excessive dermatochalasis Deep dermal scar Thick sebaceous skin History neuromuscular disorder Chronic dry eye symptom Allergy intolerance lidocaine Other local skin condition ( eg , skin infection ) target treatment site Any physical psychiatric condition investigator 's opinion would prevent adequate study participation
